T02D2381:13a-1: pra dznyo p'a ya bi nishtsa ya sa mud yam n'a ma /
T02D2381:13a-3: thabs dang shes rab gtan la phab pa'i bsdus pa zhes bya ba /
T02D2381:13a-4: dpal he ru ka la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D2381:13a-5: gang zhig sprin ltar rtog pa sel cing rang bzhin dri ma med //
T02D2381:13a-6: nang pa rnams kyi mnyam dang mi mnyam gnyis med chos sku de //
T02D2381:13a-7: gzugs ldan sna tshogs longs sku'i rang bzhin rnams kyi rgyur gyur pa //
T02D2381:13a-8: thabs dang shes rab gnyis med sprul sku de la phyag 'tshal nas //
T02D2381:13a-9: lham mkhan rig 'dzin bdag gzhan don du rnam par bsdu byas nas //
T02D2381:13a-10: ma rtogs sems can rnams la phan phyir ma lus de nyid ni //
T02D2381:13a-11: bdag gis bshad bya blo ldan rnams kyis gus pas mnyan par gyis //
T02D2381:13a-12: dngos po'i rtog pa la brten nas //
T02D2381:13a-13: dngos med bdag med yang dag 'byung //
T02D2381:13a-14: gnyi ga rtog pa mnyam mod kyi //
T02D2381:13a-15: byis pa rnams la drang phyir gsungs //
T02D2381:13a-16: de la nyon mongs thams cad de //
T02D2381:13a-18: bdag gzhan gnyis kyi 'dzin pa yis //
T02D2381:13a-19: thar ba thob par mi 'gyur bas //
T02D2381:13a-20: de phyir dngos po spang bya zhing //
T02D2381:13a-21: dngos med la yang brten mi bya //
T02D2381:13a-22: rnal 'byor dngos po la brten na //
T02D2381:13b-0: 'khor ba nyid las gzhan du @13b min //
T02D2381:13b-1: phan tshun 'brel phyir de dag min //
T02D2381:13b-2: de min bdag gzhan grub pa med //
T02D2381:13b-3: dper na nam mkha'i me tog bzhin //
T02D2381:13b-4: de phyir dngos dang dngos med ni //
T02D2381:13b-5: brdzun pa'i cho 'phrul spang bar bya //
T02D2381:13b-6: rang bzhin ma grub dri ma med //
T02D2381:13b-7: de phyir pha rol phyin mar grags //
T02D2381:13b-8: khyab byed snying rje dbyar med de //
T02D2381:13b-9: rnal 'byor pa yi thabs yin no //
T02D2381:13b-11: thabs dang shes rab gnyis med pa //
T02D2381:13b-13: dri med dngos po'i mtshan ma bral //
T02D2381:13b-14: gnyis dang gnyis min zhi ba'i bdag / de rnams
T02D2381:13b-15: la gnas bde ba'i mchog / rang rig ye shes
T02D2381:13b-16: chos kyi dbyings // zhi dul pha rol phyin ma yin //
T02D2381:13b-17: theg pa gsum dang sku gsum ldan //
T02D2381:13b-19: dkyil 'khor rgyal mchog phyag rgya dang //
T02D2381:13b-21: lha dang lha min brgya byin dang ;
T02D2381:13b-22: / mi dang yi dags dud 'gro sogs //
T02D2381:13b-23: dper na chu yi rlabs bzhin te //
T02D2381:13b-24: de las byung zhing thim par 'gyur //
T02D2381:13b-25: de phyir thabs dang shes rab kyis //
T02D2381:13b-26: gnyis med don ni bsgom par bya //
T02D2381:13b-27: mi mnyam pa yi sngags nyid kyis //
T02D2381:13b-28: stong nyid bsgom par mi bya zhing //
T02D2381:13b-29: de bzhin dngos po bsgom mi bya //
T02D2381:13b-30: de dag gnyis kyi 'dzin pa ni //
T02D2381:13b-32: de ni mi rtag spang byas pas //
T02D2381:13b-34: brjod bral nam mkha'i snying rje ste //
T02D2381:13b-35: de nyid yid bzhin nor bu ltar //
T02D2381:13b-36: 'gro ba'i don ni byams pa yin //
T02D2381:13b-37: nam mkha' kun la khyab pa bzhin //
T02D2381:13b-38: gnyis med sems ni dga' ba yin //
T02D2381:13b-39: dngos dang dngos med gnyis dag la //
T02D2381:13b-40: bsgom pa'i btang snyoms de nyid ni //
T02D2381:13b-41: dngos med don dam bsgom par bya //
T02D2381:13b-42: bya ba dang ni byed pa po //
T02D2381:13b-43: bsgom dang sgom rgyu gnyis ka med //
T02D2381:13b-44: sbyin dang sbyin bya gnyis ma grub //
T02D2381:13b-46: brtags pas nyon mongs dngos po med //
T02D2381:13b-47: de nyid ldan pa'i rnal 'byor pa //
T02D2381:13b-48: byang chub sems ni grub 'gyur ro //
T02D2381:13b-49: chags pas bsgribs pas 'khor ba yin //
T02D2381:13b-50: sprin med nam mkha' lta bu ni //
T02D2381:14a-2: de phyir sems ni brtan byas nas //
T02D2381:14a-3: blo dang ldan pas bsgom par bya //
T02D2381:14a-4: bla ma'i zhal gyi padma las thob gdams ngag bris //
T02D2381:14a-5: bdag nyid grub pa gang zhig dge ba'i 'bras bu des //
T02D2381:14a-6: 'gro drug nyon mongs 'dam las rgal zhing dri med pa //
T02D2381:14a-7: byang chub sems la gnas shing grub pa thob par
T02D2381:14a-8: shog / thabs dang shes rab gtan la phab pa'i
T02D2381:14a-9: dngos grub bsdus pa zhes bya ba slob dpon tsam
